title: Who are we giving Salam to  at the end of Prayer? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: um second question uh when a person gives salam in congregation or alone when i say assalamu alaikum warahmatullah assalamu alaikum if i'm alone i'm giving salaam to the angels to my right and to my left and to myself if i'm in congregation i'm giving salam to the muslims to my right and to my left you
